001import java.util.Deque;
002import java.util.ArrayDeque;
003import java.util.Stack;
004import java.util.Scanner;
005import java.io.File;
006import java.io.PrintWriter;
007import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
008
009/**
010 * Moteur du jeu d'aventure
011 *
012 * @author Marie Emilienne Gnamien
013 * @version 15/03/2024
014 */
015public class GameEngine
016{
017    private UserInterface aGui;
018    private Parser aParser;
019    private Player aPlayer;
020    private String aName;
021    /**
022    * Constructeur du jeu où les pièces sont créées.
023    */
024    public GameEngine() {
025        this.aPlayer = new Player();
026        this.createRooms();
027        this.aParser = new Parser();
028    }//GameEngine()
029    
030    /**
031     * Création de l'interface et appel du message de bienvenue.
032     * @param pUserInterface UserInterface
033     */   
034    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
035    {
036        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
037        this.printWelcome();
038    }//setGUI()
039    
040    /**
041    *
042    * Affiche la pièce actuelle et les sorties possibles.
043    * 
044    */
045    private void printLocationInfo(){
046        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
047        this.aGui.showImage(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
048    }//printLocationInfo()
049
050    /**
051    *
052    * Affiche le message de bienvenue dès le lancement du jeu.
053    *
054    */
055    private void printWelcome(){
056    this.aGui.print("\n");
057    this.aGui.println("Welcome to 3417, " + this.aPlayer.getName() + ".");
058    this.aGui.print("\n");
059    this.aGui.println("Another day in this boring place..."); 
060    this.aGui.println("Grandpa asked me to help with stuff at the store today.");
061    this.aGui.println("\n");
062    this.aGui.println("Type 'help' if you need help."); 
063    this.aGui.print("\n");
064    if(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null){
065        this.aGui.showImage(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
066    }
067    }//printWelcome()
068    
069    /**
070    *
071    * Création de toutes les pièces du jeu.
072    */
073   
074    private void createRooms() {
075        Room vConvenienceStore = new Room("at grandpa's convenience store","conveniencestore.jpg");
076        Room vStreet1 = new Room("in the first street","street1.jpg");
077        Room vStreet2 = new Room("in the Second street","street2.jpg");
078        Room vStreet3 = new Room("in the Third street","street3.jpg");
079        Room vRoom = new Room("in her room","bedroom.jpg");
080        Room vBasement = new Room("in the basement","basement.jpg");
081        Room vSecretWorkShop = new Room("at the Secret workshop","secretworkshop.jpg");
082        Room vBricABrac = new Room("at the bric-a-brac","bricabrac.jpg");
083        Room vTrainStation = new Room("at the Train Station","trainstation.jpg");
084        Room vPlatform = new Room("on the Platform","platform.jpg");
085        Room vSecretBasement = new Room("at the secret basement entrance","secretbasement.jpg");
086        Room vArena = new Room("in the arena","arena.jpg");
087        Room vTrapDoor = new Room("on the footbridge","door.jpg");
088        Room vTrapDoor2 = new Room("in a lost place","lost place.jpg");
089        
090        
091        Item vKeyCard = new Item("keyCard","keyCard - a transparent keycard made out of glass.", 5);
092        Item vBroom = new Item("broom","broom - an old and dusty broom.", 700);
093        Item vMilk = new Item("milk"," milk - \"fresh milk from your favorite laboratory !\" ",800);
094        Item vGums = new Item("gums", "gums - a box of gums \"for bad breath\" ", 100);
095        Item vArticulatedArmV1 = new Item("armV1"," armV1 - Articulated Arm V1 \" based on a low technology quality \" ", 1250);
096        Item vPills = new Item("pills", " pills - purple pills : \" do not consume these without a doctor's advice. \" ", 5);
097        Item vMagicCookie = new Item("magicCookie", "magicCookie - ???",100);
098        Beamer vBeamer = new Beamer();        
099        
100        vSecretBasement.addItem("pills",vPills);
101        vBricABrac.addItem("armV1", vArticulatedArmV1);
102        
103        vConvenienceStore.addItem("gums",vGums);
104        vConvenienceStore.addItem("magicCookie", vMagicCookie);
105        vRoom.addItem("keyCard",vKeyCard);
106        vBasement.addItem("broom",vBroom);
107        vBasement.addItem("milk", vMilk);
108        vBricABrac.addItem("beamer",vBeamer);
109        
110        vConvenienceStore.setExit("north",vStreet2);
111        vConvenienceStore.setExit("down", vBasement);
112        vConvenienceStore.setExit("south",vRoom);
113        vConvenienceStore.setExit("west",vStreet1);
114        vConvenienceStore.setExit("east",vStreet3);
115        
116        vStreet1.setExit("north", vBricABrac);
117        vStreet1.setExit("south", null);
118        vStreet1.setExit("west", null);
119        vStreet1.setExit("east", vConvenienceStore);
120        
121        vStreet2.setExit("north", null);
122        vStreet2.setExit("south", vConvenienceStore);
123        vStreet2.setExit("west", null);
124        vStreet2.setExit("east", vTrapDoor2);
125        
126        vStreet3.setExit("north", null);
127        vStreet3.setExit("south", vTrainStation);
128        vStreet3.setExit("west", vConvenienceStore);
129        vStreet3.setExit("east", null);
130        
131
132        vRoom.setExit("north", vConvenienceStore);
133        vRoom.setExit("south", null);
134        vRoom.setExit("west", null);
135        vRoom.setExit("east", null);
136        
137        vBasement.setExit("north", null);
138        vBasement.setExit("south", null);
139        vBasement.setExit("west", null);
140        vBasement.setExit("up",vConvenienceStore);
141        vBasement.setExit("east", vSecretWorkShop);
142        
143        
144        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("north", null);
145        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("south", null);
146        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("west", vBasement);
147        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("east", null);
148        
149        vBricABrac.setExit("north", null);
150        vBricABrac.setExit("south", vStreet1);
151        vBricABrac.setExit("west", null);
152        vBricABrac.setExit("east", null);
153        
154        vTrainStation.setExit("north", vStreet3);
155        vTrainStation.setExit("south", vPlatform);
156        vTrainStation.setExit("west", null);
157        vTrainStation.setExit("east", null);      
158
159        vPlatform.setExit("north", vTrainStation);
160        vPlatform.setExit("south", null);
161        vPlatform.setExit("west", null);
162        vPlatform.setExit("east", vSecretBasement); 
163
164        vSecretBasement.setExit("north", null);
165        vSecretBasement.setExit("south", vTrapDoor);
166        vSecretBasement.setExit("west", vPlatform);
167        vSecretBasement.setExit("east", vArena); 
168        
169        vArena.setExit("north",null);
170        vArena.setExit("south",null);
171        vArena.setExit("west",vSecretBasement);
172        vArena.setExit("east",null);
173        
174        vTrapDoor.setExit("north",vSecretBasement);
175        vTrapDoor.setExit("down",vConvenienceStore);
176        
177        vTrapDoor2.setExit("west", vStreet2);
178        vTrapDoor2.setExit("south",vSecretBasement);
179        
180        this.aPlayer.changeRoom(vConvenienceStore);
181    }//createRooms()
182    
183        /**
184        *
185        * Affiche la description du lieu actuel.
186        */
187    private void look(){//
188        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
189    }//look()
190    
191        /**
192        * Affiche un message dans la fenêtre lorsque l'utilisateur entre la commande eat.
193        * @param pItem nom de l'Item
194        */
195    private void eat(final String pItem){//
196        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.eat(pItem));
197    }//eat(.)
198    
199        /**
200        * Permet de revenir dans la salle précédente une fois la commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
201        */
202    private void back(){//
203        if(this.aPlayer.back()){
204            this.printLocationInfo();
205        }
206        else{
207            this.aGui.println("You can't go back...");
208        return;
209        }
210    }//back()
211    
212    /**
213     * Permet de lire le fichier texte mis en paramètre.
214     * @param pTextFichier fichier texte
215     */
216    private void lecture(final String pTextFichier){
217        Scanner vSc;
218        try{
219        vSc = new Scanner(new File(pTextFichier));
220        while(vSc.hasNextLine()){
221            String vLigne = vSc.nextLine();
222            this.interpretCommand(vLigne);
223        }
224        
225        vSc.close();
226        }
227        catch(final FileNotFoundException pFNFE){
228            
229        }
230        
231    }//lecture(.)
232    
233        /**
234        * Retourne un booléen après traitement de la commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
235        * @param pWord Commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
236        */
237       
238        public void interpretCommand(final String pWord){
239        this.aGui.println( "> " + pWord );
240        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand(pWord); 
241        
242        if(vCommand.isUnknown()) {
243            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean ?");
244            return;
245        }
246        
247        String vCommandWord = vCommand.getCommandWord();
248    
249        if(vCommandWord.equals("help")){
250            this.printHelp();
251        }
252
253        else if(vCommandWord.equals("go")){
254            if(this.aPlayer.getQuest() == true){
255            this.goRoom(vCommand);
256            this.aPlayer.quest();
257            if(this.aPlayer.getSteps() >= 3 && this.aPlayer.hasItemInventory("broom") == false){
258                this.aGui.println("You must find the broom... Try again.");
259                this.endGame();
260            }
261            if(this.aPlayer.getSteps() < 3 && this.aPlayer.hasItemInventory("broom") == true){
262                this.aPlayer.enableQuest(false);
263                this.aGui.println("Good job, you found the broom.");
264            }            
265            }
266            else{
267            this.goRoom(vCommand);
268            }
269        }
270        else if(vCommandWord.equals("look")){
271            this.look();
272        }
273        else if(vCommandWord.equals("eat")){
274            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && this.aPlayer.hasItemInventory("magicCookie")){
275                this.eat(vCommand.getSecondWord());
276            }
277            else if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && this.aPlayer.hasItemInventory("gums")){
278                this.eat(vCommand.getSecondWord());
279            }
280            else{
281            this.aGui.println("You can't do that");
282        }
283        }
284        
285        else if(vCommandWord.equals("back")){
286            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
287                this.aGui.println("You can't do that...");
288            }
289            else{
290                this.back();
291            }
292        }
293        else if(vCommandWord.equals("take")){
294            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
295                if(this.aPlayer.hasItemRoom(vCommand.getSecondWord())){
296                this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.take(vCommand.getSecondWord()));
297                if(vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("beamer")){
298                    this.aGui.println("You need to charge the beamer in another room.");
299                }
300            } 
301           
302            else{
303                this.aGui.println("This item is not in this room..");
304            }
305            }
306            else{
307                this.aGui.println("You can't do that...");
308            }
309        }
310        
311        else if(vCommandWord.equals("drop")){
312            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
313                if(!this.aPlayer.hasItemRoom(vCommand.getSecondWord())){//
314                this.aPlayer.drop(vCommand.getSecondWord());
315                }
316                else{
317                this.aGui.println("This item is not in your inventory..");
318                }
319            }
320            else{
321                this.aGui.println("You can't do that...");
322            }
323        }
324
325        else if (vCommandWord.equals("items")){
326            if (vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
327                this.aGui.println( "You can't do that.." );
328            }
329            else{
330                this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.items());
331            }
332        }
333        
334        else if (vCommandWord.equals("quit")){
335            if (vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
336                this.aGui.println( "Quit what?" );
337            }
338            else{
339                this.endGame();
340            }
341        }
342        else if(vCommandWord.equals("test")){
343            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("essai")){
344                this.lecture("essai.txt");
345            }
346            else if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("victoire")){
347                this.lecture("victoire.txt");
348            }
349            else if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("court")){
350                this.lecture("court.txt");
351            }
352            else if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("all")){
353                this.lecture("all.txt");
354            }
355        }
356        else if(vCommandWord.equals("quest")){
357            if(this.aPlayer.getQuest()){
358            this.aGui.println("Find the broom to clean the store");
359            }
360            else if(!this.aPlayer.getQuest()){
361                this.aGui.println("There is no quest...");
362            }
363        }
364        else if(vCommandWord.equals("charge")){
365            if(!vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
366                this.aGui.println("Charge what ?...");
367            
368            }
369            else if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
370            if(!vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("beamer")){
371                    this.aGui.println("You can't charge this...");
372                }
373            else if(vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("beamer")){
374                this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.charge());
375            }
376            }
377            }
378        else if(vCommandWord.equals("fire")){
379            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
380                this.aGui.println("You can't do this...");
381            }
382            else if(!vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
383                this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.fire());
384                this.aGui.println("");
385                this.printLocationInfo();
386            }
387        }
388        else{
389            this.aGui.println("Erreur du programmeur : commande non reconnue !");
390        }
391    
392    }//interpretCommand(.)
393    
394    /**
395    *
396    * Affiche le message d'aide.
397    */
398    private void printHelp(){
399    this.aGui.println("");
400    this.aGui.println("You are wandering around Nydia...");
401    this.aGui.println("If you lost your way, your command words are : ");
402    this.aGui.println("");
403    this.aGui.println(this.aParser.getCommandString());
404    }//printHelp()
405    
406    
407    /**
408    *
409    * Permet de se déplacer entre les différentes pièces du jeu.
410    * @param pRoom pièce dans laquelle l'utilisateur veut se rendre
411    */
412   
413    private void goRoom(final Command pRoom){
414        Room vNextRoom = null;
415        String vDirection = pRoom.getSecondWord();
416        
417        if(!pRoom.hasSecondWord()){
418                this.aGui.println("Go where ?");
419                return;
420            }
421        vNextRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getExit(vDirection);
422        
423        if(vNextRoom != null){
424            this.aPlayer.addStackRoom();
425            this.aPlayer.changeRoom(vNextRoom);
426            this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
427            if(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null){
428                this.aGui.showImage(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
429            }
430        }
431        else if(vNextRoom == null){
432            this.aGui.println("There is no path!");
433            return;
434        }
435        else{
436            this.aGui.println("Unknown direction !");
437        }
438    } //goRoom(.)
439    
440    /** Procédure d'arrêt du jeu.
441    */
442    private void endGame()
443    {
444        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
445        this.aGui.enable( false );
446    }//endGame()
447
448}
